attributes.action: No halal/prestunned halal to be served non muslim children without prior consent
attributes.additional_details: School dinner ladies have been sacked for giving pork to muslim children but Christian children are fed halal everyday without knowledge consent and against their beliefs
attributes.background: Muslims object when their children are fed pork - we as a Christian culture should have right to say that our children do not eat ritually blessed food without our knowledge

rejection.details:
We have now approved this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106582
